attributes.action: Remove & Bann The Traitors  Who Signed Away Our Nation From Great Britain For Life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Queen Elizabeth II Signed 5 EU Treaties

Edward Heath (1972 The Communities Act)

Margaret Thatcher (1986 Single European Act)

John Major (7 February 1992 The Maastricht Treaty)

Tony Blair Signed 3 EU Treaties 

Gordon Brown Signed The Lisbon Treaty

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
